name: @wwawing/loader
description: a World Wide Adventure mapdata loader for client-side web applications

scripts.start: npm run clean:debug && npm run start:deploy && http-server ./debug -o
scripts.build: npm run build:prepare && npm run build:normal && npm run build:noworker && npm run clean:tmp
scripts.build:prepare: npm run clean:tmp && cpx src/**/*.ts build-tmp && cpx build-tmp/*.ts build-tmp/noworker
scripts.build:normal: npm run build:normal:tsc && npm run build:normal:uglify
scripts.build:noworker: npm run build:noworker:tsc && npm run build:noworker:uglify
scripts.clean: npm run clean:debug && npm run clean:tmp && npm run clean:lib

author: WWA Wing Team
